Be a part of the Cardiff Business School Society and enhance your university experience! Whether you're studying at the Business School or have a keen interest in our courses, you're welcome to join our community!

This society will help you connect with Cardiff University peers and feel a sense of belonging! Join us to make the most of your university experience with valuable insights, connections and lots of fun!
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our Instagram.
Our membership is Â£4.00 for the year!

We host thoughtfully planned events that complement your academics. From insightful guest talks to practical workshops, we offer more than just classroom learning. And, of course, you can look forward to lots of socials, including our annual balls!
